a-table/dataIndex.description: Display field of the data record, could be set like a.b.c

a-table/defaultSortOrder.description: Default order of sorted values: 'ascend' 'descend' null

a-table/filteredValue.description: Controlled filtered value, filter icon will highlight

a-table/filterMultiple.description: Whether multiple filters can be selected

a-table/fixed.description: Set column to be fixed: true(same as left) 'left' 'right'

a-table/key.description: Unique key of this column, you can ignore this prop if you've set a unique dataIndex

a-table/customRender.description: Renderer of the table cell. The return value should be a VNode, or an object for colSpan/rowSpan config

a-table/sorter.description: Sort function for local sort, see Array.sort's compareFunction. If you need sort buttons only, set to true

a-table/customHeaderCell.description: Set props on per header cell

a-table/onFilter.description: Callback executed when the confirm filter button is clicked, Use as a filter event when using template or jsx

a-table/onFilterDropdownVisibleChange.description: Callback executed when filterDropdownVisible is changed, Use as a filterDropdownVisible event when using template or jsx

a-table/slots.description: When using columns, you can use this property to configure the properties that support the slot, such as slots: { filterIcon: 'XXX'}

a-table/scopedSlots.description: When using columns, you can use this property to configure the properties that support the slot-scope, such as scopedSlots: { customRender: 'XXX'}
